title: Championship Round preview and Divisional Round recap
itunes:title: Championship Round preview and Divisional Round recap
description:
The Good Morning Football Crew starts up the show with a recap of the best moments from the Divisional Round Weekend (1:00) including the Saints' thrilling win over the Eagles, and a look ahead to their much anticipated NFC championship matchup with the Rams (23:40). The gang then gets into what they learned from the weekend, such as Kyle Brandt's new favorite head coach (40:40), and Nate Burleson explains why Julian Edelman is the Patriots' X-factor for another Super Bowl run (48:35). Lastly, Nate Burleson and Peter Schrager agree to disagree on some of the week's most unique stories with another round of '2-Point Conversing' (58:45). Be sure to check in every Wednesday to the GMFB podcast! Like, share, subscribe!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
